He is surrounded by potted plants (tall slender, bushy, and leafy) against a light blue, subtly glittery sky background. The real-world background is a bright, out-of-focus bokeh of green plants, with a succulent in a terracotta pot on a wooden surface visible to the lower right.
refined_video_prompt: A human hand actively rotates a decorative magnet, dynamically changing its visible image to reveal an anime character. Simultaneously, background foliage gently sways, and a succulent plant subtly undulates.
